milestones.title: Q1: Options Chain + Greeks Panel; Calendar/Diagonal constructor; Notion journal writes.
Q2: Sleeve Capacity module; Unusual Flow radar; Exit Whisper integration.
Q3: Portfolio risk overlays; EOD recap composer.
Q4: Performance hardening; accessibility AA; institutional compliance pack.
Expand broker adapters and Keychain/OAuth gateways.
Layer vanna/volga surfaces and voice/visionOS interfaces into the risk console.
Automate CI perf tests and encryption questionnaires.
Deliver cross-entity trading suite with real-time sleeve governance.
Auto-generate audit trails and lender-ready reporting.
Ship modular UI toolkit enabling external investor extensions.

principles: Automation: use Swift-based launchpad/scratch tools (SPM) and avoid Python for repository automation.

items: > Forward-looking roadmap for the iOS Engineer agent. Complements `ios-engineer.agent.md` (mandate) > and `ios-engineer.agency.md` (memory), fulfilling the AGENTS/AGENCY/AGENDA triad.

items: Translate trader-aware and CFO/COO stewardship into actionable milestones.
Maintain roadmap continuity so releases uphold entity segregation and compliance.
sections.title: Purpose

items: Each milestone logs context in `ios-engineer.agency.md` and references `ios-engineer.agent.md`.
Roadmap revisions occur alongside triad updates to preserve institutional continuity.
